improvedmapcolors.configuration.use_file: Use a list of colors from the CSV defined below
improvedmapcolors.configuration.title: Improved Map Colors Configuration
improvedmapcolors.configuration.color_fi:
Path to a CSV list of colors like: |hex color|[optional id]|
If no ID is supplied, the id will be the row number in the file
improvedmapcolors.configuration.colorlis: List of colors to replace vanilla map colors, defaulting to Vanilla colors (gneiss colors)
improvedmapcolors.configuration.state_li: List of BlockStates:ColorID to change from Vanilla BlockStates (will default to Gneiss states when/if available)
improvedmapcolors.configuration.use_bloc: Use a list of BlockStates and colorIDs from a CSV defined below
improvedmapcolors.configuration.blocksta:
Path to a CSV list of files like: 
|BlockID[statedata]|colorID<required>| OR:
|BlockID|[statedata]|colorID<required>|
improvedmapcolors.configuration.colorCon:
What mode to use when loading color values
On conflicts, datapack values will override the config, and CSV values will override both datapacks and the config
improvedmapcolors.configuration.statesCo:
What mode to use when loading BlockState values
On conflicts, datapack values will override the config', and CSV values will override both datapacks and the config
improvedmapcolors.configuration.packExpo:
Path to export a preset datapack to from listed CSVs
note: Config mode has to be set to CSV_FILE or ALL
improvedmapcolors.configuration.packName: Namespace of the pack you are exporting
improvedmapcolors.configuration.preset.v: Set preset to Vanilla(clears other presets)
Show the list of presets that come with the mod
item.improvedmapcolors.map_block_item.to: %s and %s + %s to tune map color values
